text: 🌾 Exciting update! ICAR has released new guidelines for B.Sc Agriculture admissions 2025. 📚 Stay prepared, future agri professionals! 🚜
👩‍🌾 Krishi Vigyan Kendra has announced a new training program on sustainable tomato farming! 🍅 Learn modern cultivation practices and marketing strategies.
🚀 Agri Expo 2025 is coming this December! 🤝 Join to explore innovations and network with professionals. 🌱
